.. _mendeleev:

====================================
Welcome to mendeleev's documentation
====================================


This package provides an API for accessing various properties of elements from
the periodic table of elements.

.. image:: img/periodictable.png
    :width: 1000px
    :align: center
    :alt: alternate text
